There’s no roundabout way of saying this - get your signals right! - Wyn Drabble https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/theres-no-roundabout-way-of-saying-this-get-your-signals-right-wyn-drabble/7WXGTTUBCZHNLNJTLMSG37ZHBU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/theres-no-roundabout-way-of-saying-this-get-your-signals-right-wyn-drabble/7WXGTTUBCZHNLNJTLMSG37ZHBU/ Wyn DrabbleI thought I might suggest a rewrite of the current roundabout Road Code entry. Thu, 18 Jul 2024 01:59:16 +0000 Here, in plain language is the rule for travelling straight through a roundabout: “Don’t signal before entering the roundabout. Signal left when you pass the exit before the one you want.” Couldn’t be much simpler than that. Definitely don’t signal right, says Wyn Dabble. Photo / NZTA Waka Kotahi
